ygData.subject: Re: Crisson's Pixie Chase
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a targeted Lullaby song.  It is very useful when your group is fighting 2 yellow mobs, it let you sleep one while your group is concentrating on the
ygData.messageBody:
It is a targeted Lullaby song. It is very useful when your group is
fighting 2 yellow mobs, it let you sleep one while your group is
concentrating on the other. I think they also change the song name from
Pixie Chase to Pixie.. something else.

And to the other person who was asking about the level 3 song. It is NOT a
mana regen song, it regen STA not mana. To get the mana regen song, you
will have to wait until level 32. The message will say your mind is clear..
when you play that song.

>
>Does anyone know what Crisson's Pixie Chase does? It is the lvl 28 song
>and
>I heard it was tweaked on the patch before the last one, still don't know
>what it does though.
>
